about_the_game:
Defend from Candyland! - Tower Defense Sweetness!


Immerse yourself in the ultimate tower defense experience! Can you withstand the sugary assault and rise to the top of the leaderboard?

Gripping Story:
Immerse yourself in the tale of Eden's struggle against the sour onslaught from Candyland. Uncover the mystery behind the invasion and meet intriguing characters along the way.



Interactive Tutorial with Dr. Dexter:
Learn from the best! Dr. Dexter's new interactive tutorial will guide you through all essential mechanics and strategies, whether you're a new player or a seasoned defender.



Plant Your Defense!:
Plant trees to battle the sour candies and Defend from Candyland! Strategize and construct your ultimate defense setup.



Path-Shaping Mastery:
Bend the enemy's path with cleverly positioned trees. Slow down and divert the relentless candy invaders. Every twist and turn affects the outcome.



Shop Smart, Defend Better:
Enhance your defences by buying trees, buffs, and items that reveal enemy paths. Build a formidable defense with smart purchases.

Evolving Defenses:
Nurture and upgrade your trees as you master the art of tower defense. Adapt to evolving challenges and crush the candy invaders.



Endless Mode Showdown:
Test your skills in Endless Mode, complete with a public leaderboard. Can you reach the top?

Triumph Over Sugary Foes:
Face waves of candies of all sizes. Each has its own weakness. Can you outsmart them all?

Challenging Levels:
Take on 120 meticulously designed levels. The battle for Eden has just begun!

Unique Towers:
Discover a delightful range of tower types. Crush the candy invaders with the Peashooter, Cherry Bomb, and more!



Meet Eden's Guardians:
Engage with the charming residents of Eden. Get to know Oracle Tree, Mrs. Applebee, and others!



Top-Notch Pixel Art:
Enjoy stunning pixel art. Eden comes to life with every tree, candy, and character.

Incredible Soundtrack:
Experience an enchanting soundtrack by Arman Mkhitaryan.

Enhanced Visuals and Health Bars:
Enjoy updated visuals and improved health bar positioning for a more immersive experience.

Steam Store Art:

Millie Elsdon-James's art sets the stage for your candy-crushing adventure.

Challenge Your Wits:
Can you outsmart the candies as they grow in strength and numbers? Overcome ever-changing challenges.



Your Destiny Awaits:
Build your towers and unleash your tower defense prowess. Defend Eden from the candy onslaught. Are you up for the challenge? Can you

name: Defend from Candyland!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.6 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

reviews:
“Defend from Candyland ticks all the correct tower defence boxes. The interface is clear and simple enough to quickly find what you need. The gameplay is logical and 120 levels should keep any strategy fan happy. There are also different difficulty options and an endless mode that both add some longevity.”
3.8/5 – Fusion R Gamer

“Defend From Candyland is one of the better Tower Defense games in terms of gameplay, but graphically it comes across as a bit weak, despite seeming to honor old Flash games. Still, this is recommended, especially since there are so few games in the genre where you have to think smart about the path you create with your towers.”
7.8/10 – That's Gaming
short_description: Step into the world of Defend from Candyland! where retro tower defense meets strategic depth. Plant and upgrade trees, use powerful buffs, and reveal enemy paths to shield Eden from waves of candy invaders. Master the challenge now!
